please_verify_click_here_to_maintain_you: Please verify (click here) to maintain your account
please_verify_click_here_to_protect_your: Please verify (click here) to protect your account
incorrect_verification_code_you_have_2_a: Incorrect verification code, you have 2 attempts left
you_have_entered_the_otp_incorrectly_thr: You have entered the OTP incorrectly three times. Please wait 30 minutes and try again.
to_reset_your_password_please_enter_your: To reset your password, please enter your phone number below
password_for_account_security_and_transa: Password for account security and transaction confirmation at checkout
note_password_needs_to_be_at_least_8_cha: Note: Password needs to be at least 8 characters including lowercase, uppercase, and number
topped_up_money_to_wallet_from_vietcomba: Topped up money to wallet from Vietcombank
please_allow_using_camera_in_your_app_se: Please allow using camera in your app settings by going to Settings -> EPAY -> Enable Camera and go back to continue using your app
please_position_your_id_card_in_this_rec: Please position your ID card in this rectangular frame, take a clear and bright picture
face_authentication_photo_must_be_bright: Face authentication photo must be bright enough, not blurred, glare
congratulations_you_have_successfully_ve: Congratulations, you have successfully verified your EPAY account!
to_be_able_to_pay_for_services_on_epay_y: To be able to pay for services on EPAY, you need to connect to a bank account.
leaving_the_account_identification_proce: Leaving the account identification process, you will have to go through the identification steps from the beginning.
you_have_not_connected_your_cardbank_acc: You have not connected your Card/Bank Account yet.
connect_now_to_use_epays_payment_service: Connect now to use EPAY's Payment Services
which_back_are_you_looking_for: Which back are you looking for?
the_phone_number_signing_up_for_epay_mus: The phone number signing up for EPAY must be
to_use_the_money_transfer_function_epay_: To use the money transfer function, EPAY needs access to your contact book
this_phone_number_has_not_registered_wit: This phone number has not registered with EPAY
the_connection_is_failed_please_try_agai: The connection is failed. Please try again.
point_the_camera_frame_at_the_qr_code_to: Point the camera frame at the QR code to scan
select_a_payment_code_and_show_it_to_cas: Select a payment code and show it to cashier
